name: chinmay sapre
text:
Good for quick bite of pizza.
I generally don't rate or care about fast food places. But this time the place was exceptionally dirty with almost all veggies looking old. I asked the guy and …More

name: Donovin Hendrix
text: Took my girl out on our first date, absolutely loved it! Affordable and creative I love how you can watch them make your pizza.

name: Shavonne
text: Really good pizza with a friendly staff. A great place for kids. It really cool being able to pick out your toppings that are in front of you. It truly feels customized.

name: Bonnie Pearce
text: Let me start by saying save your money and go to Blaze. Today I thought I would try Pieology since they are new in town. I have a gluten allergy and was glad to find out the had gluten free crust. I was not surprised that they charged an …More

name: Jose Cruz
text: Staff takes their time, no rush, big portions, looks like their crafting art instead of building a pizza - awesome! And, of course, tastes great!

name: McKinsey Golfin
text: Tried their new deep dish. Loved it!

name: Jacqueline K
text: So many veggies! Great meal for the price. Pizzas are ready in just a few minutes.

name: Liberty Stump
text: So delicious, so friendly, so fast, so awesome! Definitely worth the trip. I had the zesty artichoke which was phenomenal! My husband went for the Butchers Special, and we ordered a plate of Ooey Gooey Cheese Bread. Yummy! The bread had …More

name: Kayla Dusseau
text: If you like Blaze pizza you'll LOVE Pieology. It's the same concept but the pizza is delicious, the quality doesn't suffer from the speed! And the staff is amazing. GET THE HERB BUTTER IT PUTS IT OVER THE TOP!! They have yummy diner ranch too. Love this place!

name: Allan
text: Service was great and the crust was crispy as fudge.

name: Bethany Taylor
text: Went here for the first time today and had an amazing experience! I got a vegan pizza and the manager was very careful about using different gloves for my pizza etc. super friendly guy and gave us two free desserts when the wait ended up …More

name: Berry Welser
text: One of the make your own pizzas fast places that have opened up.  I prefer Pieology over most of the others like it.  They always get my order right and the pizzas are delicious.  A real hit in my house.

name: Tonya S
text: Amazing any time I am in town I come here. I have never been disappointed.

name: Ian Todd
text: Showed up after the bar and had a great pizza. Loved it so much, we decided to order the exact same one again to take home with us. …More

name: Ryan Michael Dinkgrave
text: I expected this to be just like the other fast custom pizza places that have opened up locally. But it turned out to be much better than the competition. Lots of options for customizing.

name: Jesse Beatty
text: Good, fresh ingredients. But way too much cheese. Crust on pizza (and especially bread sticks) doesn't cook properly. There's a similar, better option just down the road.

name: Jillian B
text: Arrived at 11:50am. Sign on the door says 11am-11pm. But the doors were locked despite the oven being on and an employee inside. They need to update their signs if they changed their hours of operation. Smh my friends say this place is good,  I'll change my rating when i can actually try the food.

name: Tabatha Ripley-Hathaway
text: I love all the choices of toppings. My only issue is depending on who is working how well or poorly the pizzas are actually cooked. Either the pizza can still be doughy and not completely cooked or burnt. If they fling it in the pizza oven …More

name: Weronika Maria Norbert
text: Great place. We're regulars at Blaze Pizza and wanted to find an alternative to our favorite place that often is packed and has long wait. And Pieology is it. We loved it. I might say even more than Blaze. …More

name: Maddy DiMarzio
text: A very good deal for the price. You get unlimited toppings on your pizza for one price. The employees are very nice and very patient while you are ordering, especially if you have never been there before. They explain everything and how it works/how to order. They also deliver via grubhub!

name: Thomas Gasque
text: Mixed feelings. The service was terrible. If you want pizza made subway style it could be fun, but remember it's pizza so each pie takes a while for each person then cooking time if they put it in right away.

name: Rachel Lynn
text: Nice staff and great food 💓 This place is amazing and has good prices. They never screw up my pizza and usually bring it to me wherever I am. 💓

name: Troy Cono
text: I've eaten at several of these build-your-own, baked to order pizza concepts before, but Pieology is by far the best pizza I've had at any of them. I ordered the Spicy Italian, which I think, because I wanted to add pepperoni to it, made …More

name: Sean LaDouce
text: Absolutely terrible service here. I waited over 30 mins for a basic pizza while I watched the staff talk about absolutely nothing. I even gave a tip, which I absolutely regret. If they worked as hard at getting pizza out as they did talking …More

name: Brian Otto
text: Food was nothing spectacular.  Took about twice as long to be ready as I was told on the phone. They didn't seem particularly busy either.  Pretty sure the last of our 4 pizzas was in the oven too long.

name: Marshall Corcoran
text: Pizza for me and my wife is always hard because we both like such different things on our pizzas. But coming here is great! We both get everything we want without having to compromise with each other. Plus the prices great for the amount of food we get.

name: Matthew H.
text: This is one of the best casual fresh build your own pizza places around. A great place for a relaxed date or out with the kids. The regular crust is thin but lovely and the toppings seem fresh and plentiful. For the adults they even have a …More

name: Ethan Solomon
text: Great price for a great pie. I highly recommend their new thick dough. Unlimited toppings for a 7.99 pizza that's made fresh in front of you. Highly recommend.

name: Lindsey Hart
text: Favorite build your own pizza place. They have a lot of variety and you can load it up as much as you want. You can literally get corn on your pizza and it's delicious

name: Stephanie Celaya
text: My family and I love to go here for lunch. You get a pizza made the way you want it at a affordable price. I also like that they can cater to food allergies and have vegan options.

name: Susan Wade
text: A truly great experience, I’m glad I come here twice a month. Everyone needs to experience this. I give five star ratings!

name: Tanya Markos-Vanno
text: Went in on a Saturday and waited a long time for our pizza. Not as "Fast-casual" as I expected. Got a gluten free pizza and it didn't taste very good.

name: James Clevenger
text: Walked in at 11:15 p.m. with no customers but four employees behind the counter. Almost turned around and walked out as no one had bothered to bus the tables or clean up the floor.  We decided to stay but had to clean off the table in order …More

name: Dan O'Donovan
text: Basically Blaze pizza but they serve beer. $7.50 for a custom pizza with unlimited toppings and fresh fire cooked. Almost exact same size as Blaze pizza but more toppings are offered. Staff is always friendly. Would recommend!

name: D'Montae McWillie
text:
This place is my favorite pizza place in Royal Oak. I've been to blaze as well, and although the concept is similar the experience is worlds apart.
Pieology flavors are phenomenal!  You get to customize the pizza to your liking …More

name: Draya Mcwillie
text: Pizza is amazing. Extremely clean location very friendly staff. Worth it to go and get a pizza i love going. Any topping, great prices

name: Courtney Tamaro
text: Not a fancy place. It is basically like a Subway/Qdoba for pizza. Clever idea. Very affordable. You can get unlimited toppings on a personal pizza for $7.50. Quick service. Clean restaurant.

name: Michael J Barnes
text: After waiting an incredibly long time with no one helping at the counter. I left the last time I was here. The mediocre pizza doesn't warrant a wait.

name: Scot Ellis
text: They have awesome pizza here. I would recommend this places for any one who wants a good experience while being able to basically make there own pizza. This is my second time here and will be back again.

name: Melissa Crook
text: The gluten free crust is like cardboard.  The worker told me it was the only vegan crust, which is wrong. The whole grain is vegan. But I don't trust a place making pizza dough with more than water, flour, yeast, and maybe oil.  So, the …More

name: Alex Dukhan
text: Great pizza and a good atmosphere. Great for small groups. It was a bit understaffed on my visit though.

name: sockeye bob
text: Best made to order pizza.  Lots of vegan toppings including vegan cheese. Gluten free crusts are also available. Our go to pizza place.

name: Jess Ickes
text: The pizza was excellent.  The service was ok.  The environment was nice.  And the value was great :)

name: Demetria W.
text: Great thin crust pizza. You can create your own. And it is very affordable

name: Fadi George
text: Great pizza! Love coming here for lunch during work. #BBQChicken

name: Dizzy King
text: Great pizza. Great atmosphere. Fresh ingredients. My only complaint is it is a struggle to find parking.

name: Inayra Herron
text: Always a pleasure going here love it... The workers were really sweet as well ...

name: Pennie Burke
text: BBQ chicken pizza is outstanding. Friendly staff and quick service. We eat here often and highly recommend this place for tasty affordable fresh food.

name: Adam Failer
text: Cool place, good food. I like that you can get beer there.  Pretty affordable too.

name: Samantha Staniszewski
text: So delicious! The gluten free dough was thin and crunchy, and I piled it with a ton of fresh veggies and spicy chicken. There are no up charges; the price is the same regardless of how many toppings you get. Love that there are so many options so that you can completely customize your pizza and get exactly what you want!

name: Tom Schoultz
text: Great pizza at unbelievable price. So cool to be visiting my old home town and find a Pieology that does a better job than the one near my Arizona home!

name: Scott Wozniak
text: Great price for a great pizza and a beer during their happy hour special. Delicious food prepared quickly

name: Jayanth Dwarak
text: Absolutely love their pizzas. Their ingredients are top notch and personnel are super friendly and don't hesitate to add any number of toppings you want. The prices are quite reasonable for the quality you get.

name: clemens conrad
text: Good fast pizza. Various toppings and doughs to choose from (high rise is my favourite)

name: Will Smith
text: The cheese bread is crazy good! Nice folks working here is a nice bonus☺

name: Mona Moe
text: I usually go here during the day but I recently discovered that they are open until 3:30 in the morning which was great considering I got off work late today. The staff was very unprofessional I walked in and one guy was on his phone and I …More

name: Karl Krauskopf
text: Build your own pizza, subway style. Helpful employees but takes a while.

name: Eric
text: Interesting fast-casual design extended to pizza. The base isn't really pizza dough in the least but the flavors are pretty good. More like a wrap base than a proper pizza dough base.

name: Crystal Parker
text: My mate and I enjoy getting the make-your-own pizza. Love the flavored lemonades as well.

name: Ajanae Bracey
text: Horrible service. The first time I went the pizza wasn’t that bad I’ve had better at little ceasers but the second time I went the staff rushed me into ordering. One pizza had a hair in it and I got a refund and the other pizza was so …More

name: Dorian Woolfolk
text: Good place to get bus your own pizza. Quite a variety of toppings. Fast service.

name: Dan Wick
text: Worst service for pizza in Royal Oak. I went there at 2:30 am and hit the bar crowd so I decided to carry out my order.  As I waited in line I was jumped over by 2 customers who walked in placed their order with the very person who had …More

name: Kevin Penz
text: Similar to Blaze in that you get to choose from a variety of toppings.  The flavor of the dough and sauce at Pieology are a tad bit better in my opinion.

name: Carra Payne
text: Service here is great! So are the GF pies...a little well done is best!

name: fun fotos
text: You choose any toppings they have and they make it fresh on the spot for you

name: Katelyn Cook
text: My absolutely favorite pizza of all time. Best part you don't have to compromise toppings. Everyone gets a personal pizza with SO many choices to make your pizza.

name: John Riordan
text: This place is fantastic. My go-to pizza spot. Fresh ingredients, friendly staff, clean kitchen, quick serve times, and all at the right price; it's perfect.

name: Adam Glover
text: Destiny provide excellent customer service considering the drunk royal oak crowd. I will definitely be a return customer

name: laylajaiy
text: The restaurant has a modern decor, the staff was friendly, the pizza was delicious. I highly recommend this place. They also serve beer and wine.

name: Marsha-Ann Child
text: Love their stuff. Fresh ingredients and the staff is always helpful.

name: Adam Lancaster
text: Great pizza for a great price. Also love that they have dairy free cheese option

name: Makayla Sakurakiss
text: Went there for the first time the past week and the pizza is so fresh and amazing! You get as many toppings as you like for $7.50, I will be coming back! ;)

name: Andrea Bedard
text: Fast service. Friendly and helpful staff. Wide selection of toppings and salad fixins!  It was our first time there, we'll be back!

name: Jason G
text: It needs to be more vegan friendly! Why does this place charge $2 extra for vegan cheese. Blaze Pizza doesn't charge extra for vegan cheese!

name: Nic Van Til
text: Very solid pizza for a decent price. It's very comparable to other local pizza places that do the same style of build your own pizza, but it's a nice atmosphere.

name: Nicole
text: I normally don't post reviews but this place is HORRIBLE!!!! This so called manager named Whitney was so rude not only to me but to her colleagues as well. I also saw her making her own personal food who does that?! Apparently this place allows that kind of unproffesionalism

name: Monica Wafford
text: Really? I don't get it. What's the big deal? Another trendy pizza place.

name: Christina Allison
text: Excited to try the new local pizza place I called to order some pizzas. The young woman answered and asked me to hold promptly hung up on me. Assuming this was a mistake, I called back. It happened 3 more times, and when I arrived I decided …More

name: Austin Utendorf
text: They offer unlimited toppings for a low price. It's fast too.

name: Jonathan Wilcox
text: I walked in for the first time wanting to try something new so I chose the garlic cheese bread and to my surprise it was pretty huge for a reasonable price better to share with a friend and they also serve alcohol which is a plus 👌

name: Marie Studer
text: I luv there salads, there service is friendly & fast even today they were bizzy and the workers were on top cleaning the tables off to. Good job 👍

name: Roslynn Bland
text:
I've been here 4x and have never had a bad pizza or experience!!
Ingredients are always fresh and staff is always friendly!! Sooooo good!!!
Alfredo's Alfredo is the best!!! Try it!!!

name: Judith Jones
text: I was very disappointed! They brought the wrong pizza's to our table. When we got the right pizza's ALL three were served with burnt crust. So very disappointed!🤨😠😡

name: K S
text:
SLOOOOOOOOW!
Still waiting for a pizza 45 minutes after we can in and there were only 3 people ahead of us. About 20 minutes after finally ordering and creating our pizzas I …More

name: A Bookworm
text: Today was the 2nd time I went for pizza and salad and they didn't have any premade salad. The pizza was great and u love the quotes in the wall.

name: Keielle Paris
text: Flies kept landing on the dough. Of course they got us fresh dough, but this happened like 3 times.

name: John Hardy
text: Horrible burning sensation after eating this pizza pie! Overdone pepper in the pepperoni I guess? I nearly had to go to the emergency room to get rid of it! No warning very distressing!

name: claudia tolstyka
text: The Chipotle of pizza places.  The food is made in front of you.  Fresh.  The combinations they offer are numerous and amazing.  They cater to gluten free needs.

name: Matt Tomai
text: Get to make your own pizza right there and is pretty fast.  Great quality.

name: Karen Baxter
text: Nice place... 1st timer and I'll be back

text: Fresh and fully customizable pizza 🍕😋 that are so yummy. The restaurant is neat and well maintained.

name: Julian Suliman

text: Great place, pies and service. The people there do a great job!

name: Peter Jackson
text: My group generally agrees the flavor of the sauce is not as good as other similar shops on Main Street. Most other aspects of this experience are pleasant.

name: Theresa
text: Good pizza.  Vegetarian & vegan friendly menu.  Parking in Royal Oak is a pain.

name: Dave rave
text: The pizza was good. On par with Blaze. This place is much cleaner inside than Blaze.

name: Glenn Fischer

name: Chloé Grace

name: Terry Atkinson

name: Jill Goodwin

name: EricaThePoetess
text:
I truly enjoyed the building of my pizza..
Right up to the smiles. Quality ingredients.
Personal highlight the absence of charred ash on the bottom of my oven fired pizza.
Thank you.😆😙

name: Joseph Wisniewski
text: Best of all the "build your own" pizza places. Very friendly staff, lots of toppings and sauce options, good tasting crispy crust.

name: Katherine Kramer
text: A place where you can custom make your pizza and select from unlimited toppings.

name: Dan Fick
text: Used a Groupon here. Pizzas were very good. Quick service and quick cook times.

name: Benjamin Curtis
text: Gluten free crust was fantastic, first GF crust I really couldn't tell was GF.

name: Steven Mlot
text: Its a hard toss up between this place, Blaze Pizza and M.O.D Pizza. But this place is nonetheless delicious and at a great price.

text: You can make your own pizza? Heck yea you can, and it will be amazing!

name: Alicia Riley
text: Pleasant atmosphere, pleasant staff, grear food.

name: Harish Thiru

name: T. A.
text: Clean place, AND staff. The gluten free pizza was tasty and they serve beer/wine.

name: Felicia Springfield

name: Alicia Jackson
text: Great pizza, service has started to decline tho

name: MissionSparta

name: Matthew Sawicki
text: It wasn't anything special.  It is your basic "build your own" model pizzeria, ala Chipotle.  There were plenty of options, but I'm a crust guy and it wasn't anything more than average.

name: Robert Barksdale
text: Service great and food ok!

name: The Protean bro

name: Jill D.
